duties_responsibilities.duty: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement quality activities and meet objectives.
Thorough understanding of GCP, RWE/RWD, GXP, regulatory requirements, and data quality standards.
Critical review of SOPs for Evidence Generation activity/study requirements.
Quality review of protocol drafts and preparation of internal review deliverables.
Support audit/inspection readiness preparation and coordination.
Manage risk appropriately and drive innovative ideas for efficiencies.
Establish enterprise systems and tools for quality reviews, audits, investigations, etc.

education_certification.credential: BA/BS Degree in life sciences or health related field with 10+ years practical experience or MS/MBA with 8+ years, PharmD/PhD 6+ years and MD/DO with 3+ years.
